description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Pork Tortillas With Corn Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mexican Pork Tortillas With Corn Salsa
name: Mexican Pork Tortillas With Corn Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat tortillas as per packet instructions. Arrange tortillas, pork mixture, salsa, cheese, lettuce, avocado, coriander and lime wedges on a large board and serve a make-your-own tortilla station.
